AggregateType Class Reference

Detailed Description

Types composed of heterogenous subtypes.

C++

  • example: 
    struct A
{
    int a;
    long b;
    char c;
};
    this->members = { "int a", "long b", "char c" }, this->opensScope = { "a", "b", "c" }
